PaymentGatewayInteractionLog.description: A record of all messages exchanged with merchants, made via the payment gateway, for authorizations and payments

id.description: Unique identifier for the entity, can be null on create if auto-generated

name.description: Short name of the payment gateway interaction log entry

paymentGatewayInteractionType.description: Type of interaction with the gateway for the log entry, such as a CardPayment or RefundPayment

referencedEntityId.description: References the primary entity involved in the interaction, such as a CardPayment or RefundPayment

paymentGatewayInteractionStatus.description: Status of the interaction, such as Success or Timeout

paymentGatewayDateTime.description: Datetime provided by the gateway after successful communication

paymentGatewayReferenceNumber.description: Unique transaction identifier generated by payment gateway

paymentGatewayAuthorizationCode.description: Authorization approval code sent back by the gateway

paymentGatewayResultCode.description: Result code returned by the gateway

paymentGatewayAvsCode.description: Unique code assigned by the gateway for address verification

paymentGatewayInternalReferenceNumber.description: Unique transaction identifier generated by the internal payment platform

paymentGatewayInternalResultCode.description: Internal result code returned by the internal payment platform

paymentGatewayMessageText.description: Message sent by the payment gateway

createdDate.description: Timestamp of when the entity was created

createdBy.description: Identifies the system or user which created the entity

updatedDate.description: Timestamp of when the entity was last updated

updatedBy.description: Identifies the system or user which last updated the entity

isDeleted.description: Indicates whether or not the entity has been soft-deleted
